title: Manage Lost Child Protocol
description: A parent reports their child is missing at the stadium. The security team must execute the 'lost child' protocol.

tasks.description: Get a description of the child and their last known location from the parent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all the necessary details about the missing child.

tasks.description: Immediately notify all security and event staff with the child's description.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a broadcast alert to all staff radios.

tasks.description: Monitor surveillance cameras in the child's last known area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent begins reviewing camera footage to try and locate the child.
